import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set ticket priority"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-priority"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Changes the priority level for multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Use this to escalate or de-escalate groups of tickets based on urgency changes or SLA requirements.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.
2. **PriorityLevelId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-priority-levels) to list available priority levels and extract `PriorityLevelId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with status/assignment filters → collect `TicketId` array
2. Find priority: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-priority-levels) → select target `PriorityLevelId` (e.g., High, Critical)
3. Bulk update: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-priority](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-priority) with ticket IDs and priority
4. Verify: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with priority filter to confirm changes

**Request Body**: Provide `TicketIds` array and `PriorityLevelId`.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-priority-levels) – List priority levels
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-issue](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-issue) – Bulk issue update
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/assign-sla](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-assign-ticket-sla) – Bulk SLA assignment

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk changing ticket priorities.","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","description":"Array of ticket identifiers to update.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1},"Request":{"type":"integer","description":"Priority ID to apply to all tickets. Obtain valid values from GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities."}},"required":["TicketIds","Request"],"example":{"TicketIds":["260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518"],"Request":2},"title":"BulkSetPriorityRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
